title: Radiant Gold & Diamond Vanki Bangles: The Twisting Vine Collection
materials: high-clarity brilliant-cut diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting
features: A pair of stunning Vanki bangles featuring a unique 'twisting vine' design. Each bangle showcases a continuous flow of diamonds, expertly channel-set between ribbons of polished gold. The Vanki design represents traditional grace with a modern twist. The open design makes them easy to wear and adjust slightly.
colors: Predominantly radiant gold with the bright
white sparkle of the diamonds creating a beautiful contrast.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. These bangles add a touch of sophistication to both traditional South Indian attire (like silk sarees) and modern ensembles.
description: These bangles are a testament to timeless elegance and expert craftsmanship. The design combines traditional South Indian artistry with modern aesthetics, making them a truly unique piece. The high-quality diamonds provide exceptional brilliance, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability. The 'Vanki' style signifies prosperity and good fortune, making this set a meaningful heirloom.
